img_above_text:
![Wukong Mindcliff 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/36/Wukong_Mindcliff_11.jpg)
Once you cross the giant pit by way of the fallen pillar, take out the Monk Supporter on the other side, and work your way up the path. Another Monk Supporter can be found on the higher path leading out of a cave and back outside, but beware of a Cyan Bat lurking above.
img_below_text:
Take a right at the end and keep following the narrow path to find a third Monk Supporter and Golden Lotus Guai in front of another cave entrance.
![Wukong Mindcliff 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/dc/Wukong_Mindcliff_13.jpg)
summary_promot:

        Context:

Once you cross the giant pit by way of the fallen pillar, take out the Monk Supporter on the other side, and work your way up the path. Another Monk Supporter can be found on the higher path leading out of a cave and back outside, but beware of a Cyan Bat lurking above."
        - Following Text: "Take a right at the end and keep following the narrow path to find a third Monk Supporter and Golden Lotus Guai in front of another cave entrance.
![Wukong Mindcliff 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/dc/Wukong_Mindcliff_13.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character, Wukong, armed with a staff and cautiously approaching a Monk Supporter enemy on a snowy path near a cave entrance. This moment aligns with the preceding text, where the player is warned about encountering Monk Supporters and a Cyan Bat while progressing through the area. The image visually represents the described gameplay challenge and environmental context.
